Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.api

Main shared (used by client and server components) types of ClusterMate system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClusterMateConstants
    Constants for ClusterMate and systems built on it.
    DecodableRequestPath
    Interface implemented by server-side request objects, to allow routing/dispatching of requests based on information from path and related target metadata.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterStatusAccessor
    Helper class that handles details of getting cluster status information from a store node.
    ClusterStatusAccessor.Converter
    Simple interface for thing used to serialize payload of cluster status end point.
    EntryKey
    Base class for application-specific "refined" keys, constructed usually from StorableKey, but sometimes
    EntryKeyConverter<K extends EntryKey>
    Abstract class that defines interface to use for converting "raw" StorableKey instances into higher level key abstractions, constructing such keys, and calculating routing hash codes.
    KeyHash
    Simple value class that encapsulates a 32-bit int hash value in context of a specific KeySpace.
    KeyRange
    Logical slice of a KeySpace; a consecutive range of individual key values within value space, defined by two parameters: starting key value (inclusive), and length between 0 and length of KeySpace.
    KeyRange.External
    Helper class used for deserialization, used as "delegating" class
    KeySpace
    Entity that represents subset of key hashes used for finding nodes that are responsible for handling piece of content with given key hash.
    NodeDefinition
    Basic definition of a store node, needed to figure out which store instance(s) to contact for accessing specified entry or entries.
    NodeState  
    RequestPath
    Immutable class that defines generic API for paths used to make calls using network clients.
    RequestPathBuilder
    Builder object used for constructing RequestPath instances.
    RequestPathStrategy
    Type that defines how references are built to access a StoreMate service node.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ContentType
    Enumeration of content types that are currently used by ClusterMate(-based) systems.
    ListItemType
    Enumeration of types of list items available for listing entries.
    OperationType
    Enumeration of typical request types, based on HTTP method definitions.
    PathType
    Enumeration for standard paths recognized by a service instance.

Package com.fasterxml.clustermate.api Description

Main shared (used by client and server components) types of ClusterMate system.
